ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Any news about Tinkering Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe well if the Tinker upgrade is anything like the Poison upgrade, I d not work on it now, cause all your unlimited enduring breath helmets you make will
ygData.messageBody:
hehe well if the Tinker upgrade is anything like the Poison upgrade, I'd
not work on it now, cause all your unlimited enduring breath helmets you
make will turn into 1 charge of enduring breath. :/

*mutters something about all the 200 dmg poisons he had in the bank on wed
that now do 50 dmg*

- Tony Buser - gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land --- http://www.juju.org -
- Ubershadow Leprechaun - Level 40 Gnome Rogue - http://tunares.juju.org -
- perl -e'print pack("H*","54686f752041727420476f640a");' ----------------

On Fri, 30 Jun 2000, Joe D wrote:

> On Fri, Jun 30, 2000 at 10:02:12AM +0000, Xillitil of Povar wrote:
> >
> > gotta love verant...now i gotta decide if i should spend the 12k i got
> > saved, and practice now, or wait and see it tinkering gets cheaper when they
> > 'fix' it :(
> >
> That's a terrible fix you're in, having to decide what to do with all that.
> Tell you what. Let me help you out. I'll take all that plat off your hands
> so that you don't have to worry about it.
>
> No need to thank me. It's the least I can do for a fellow Gnome of Povar.
>
> Pasketti, Povar
